rooms.name: WalterWhiteResidence
rooms.description: You are at the White Residence, where Walter, Skyler, and Walter Jr. live.

rooms.name: PinkmanResidence
rooms.description: You have arrived at Jesse Pinkman's house, where multiple drug deals have occurred. Be careful!

rooms.name: LosPollosHermanos
rooms.description: You have reached a fast-food Chicken restaurant owned by Gustavo Fring, who is most definitely not suspicious

rooms.name: SaulOffice
rooms.description: You are at the office of Saul Goodman, a gifted lawyer with the habit of committing laundering crimes

rooms.name: WaltsRV
rooms.description: You are in Walt's and Jesse's RV. Try not to step over broken glass and leftover meth.

rooms.name: TucosHeadquarters
rooms.description: You are in the headquarters of Tuco Salamanca, an aggressive meth dealer for a penchant for killing and torturing

rooms.name: FringLaundryFront
rooms.description: You are at Gustavo Fring's Laundry Company, a place used as a front to make high-concentration meth and distributing

rooms.name: VamanosPestControl
rooms.description: You are at Vamanos Pest Control, used by Walt and Jesse to use pest-infested homes as temporary labs to make meth

rooms.name: A1A CarWash
rooms.description: You are at A1A Carwash, a place where Walt used to work as a cashier but is used as a money-laundering business later in the show

rooms.name: DEAOffice
rooms.description: You are at the DEA Office, where Hank Schrader and his partners to hunt down Heisenberg, Walter's pseudonym
